entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:32 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
